name: internationally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 in a way that involves more than one country: Her internationally acclaimed novel has won several literary prizes. They are planning to expand the business internationally. See
international
More examplesFewer examplesShe has been performing locally and internationally.He is an internationally acknowledged expert on Matisse.The country's manufacturers are internationally competitive.
